svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Perception of the safety of vaccines vs vaccine coverage, 2015
Shown on the vertical axis is the share of children (12-23 months) immunized against diphtheria, pertussis (whooping
“Overall I do not think vaccines are safe”
Share of children immunized against DTP
Source: Vaccine Confidence Project, Larson et al (2016), Immunization against DPT – World Bank (WDI) (2016)
